name.baseName: Farmland remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Solidification/stabilization ; End-of disposal ; Soil sample transportation
农田修复;原位修复;钝化修复;后端处置;土样运输

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described process is specific to the domain of environmental management and soil remediation, intended for use in stabilizing heavy metal-contaminated farmland. The application involves the agricultural soil remediation of land spanning 16 hectares in Nujiang, Yunnan Province, which has been polluted by lead-zinc mining activities. The stabilization technique implemented ensures that crops meet 100% of the safety standards for Cd and Pb concentrations, and effectively reduces the bioavailable concentrations of Cd and Pb in the soil by over 70%.
稳定化修复的后端处置阶段，检测修复后的土样1000kg，从云南省兰坪运输到江苏省南京进行检测。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: 云南省怒江州受铅锌矿污染某耕地土壤 污染修复工程

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process is specific to the domain of environmental management and soil remediation, intended for use in stabilizing heavy metal-contaminated farmland. The application involves the agricultural soil remediation of land spanning 16 hectares in Nujiang, Yunnan Province, which has been polluted by lead-zinc mining activities. The stabilization technique implemented ensures that crops meet 100% of the safety standards for Cd and Pb concentrations, and effectively reduces the bioavailable concentrations of Cd and Pb in the soil by over 70%.
所描述的过程特定于环境管理和土壤修复领域，旨在用于稳定重金属污染的农田。该应用程序涉及怒江，云南省16公顷受铅锌矿活动污染的农业土壤修复。实施的稳定化技术确保农作物满足Cd和Pb浓度安全标准的100％，并有效降低土壤中Cd和Pb的生物有效浓度超过70％。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).
肖萌 et al. 农田污染钝化修复环境影响定量评估方法与案例分析. 中国环境科学 43, 3571–3581 (2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for environmental impact assessments or other LCA activities, users should ensure that the scope of their study aligns with the specific context of heavy metal-contaminated farmland in Yunnan Province. Adjustments may be necessary for different geographic locations or pollutant types. Attention should be paid to the consistency of the measured parameters, such as the concentrations of bioavailable Cd and Pb, and the particular agricultural practices in place. Furthermore, the end-of-life phase described – the transportation of 1000kg of remediated soil from Lanping, Yunnan to Nanjing, Jiangsu for testing – should be incorporated into the life cycle inventory, including considerations of transportation emissions and energy use.
当使用此数据集进行环境影响评估或其他LCA活动时，用户应确保其研究范围与云南省重金属污染农田的具体背景相一致。对于不同的地理位置或污染物类型，可能需要进行调整。应注意测量参数的一致性，如生物有效的Cd和Pb浓度，以及特定的农业实践。此外，描述的终生阶段——将1000公斤经修复的土壤从云南兰坪运至江苏南京进行检测——应并入生命周期清单中，包括运输排放和能源使用的考虑。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
